mapper.sql: c.category_id AS categoryId, c.name, c.parent, c.description, c.create_by AS "createBy.userId", c.create_date AS createDate, c.update_by AS "updateBy.userId", c.update_date AS updateDate
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM category c ORDER BY c.category_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category(category_id, name, parent, description, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date) VALUES(#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{parent}, #{description}, #{createBy.userId}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.userId}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET name = #{name}, parent = #{parent}, description = #{description}, update_by = #{updateBy.userId}, update_date = #{updateDate}, WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
